com.tractrac.subscription.lib.impl.io

Class DataControllerAsio

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tractrac.subscription.lib.impl.io.DataControllerAsio

  • public class DataControllerAsio
extends java.lang.Object
    Mostly a convenience wrapper for TypeControllerCollection, but is tied to a specific Asio I/O service.

    Most important function is the Listener interface, which can provide a user with useful information regarding live and stored data, including stored data progress.

    Has a method for requesting the UTC time of the live data server.

    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jan Marthedal Rasmussen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DataControllerAsio.Listener
      Provides information on the status of live and stored data.
      static interface  DataControllerAsio.TimeListener
      A callback that will be called when the UTC time of the live data server is received.

    • Method Detail

      • hasLiveData

        public boolean hasLiveData()
        Answers whether live data is enabled
        Returns:
        true if enabled

      • isLiveConnected

        public boolean isLiveConnected()
        Answers whether live is connected
        Returns:
        true if connected

      • hasStoredData

        public boolean hasStoredData()
        Answers whether stored data is enabled
        Returns:
        true if enabled

      • add

        public void add(TypeController typeController)
        Adds a new type controller to the collection.

        May be added after live and/or stored data has been started.

        Parameters:
        typeController - the type controller to add

      • remove

        public void remove(TypeController typeController)
        Removes an existing type controller from the collection.

        Automatically closes down live and stored data requests.

        Parameters:
        typeController - the type controller to remove

      • getUtcTime

        public void getUtcTime(DataControllerAsio.TimeListener timeListener)

      • startLive

        public boolean startLive()
        Starts live data retrieval for all type controllers.

        If live data has not been enabled then this call has no effect.

      • stopLive

        public boolean stopLive()
        Stops live data retrieval for all type controllers

      • startStored

        public boolean startStored()
        Starts stored data retrieval for all type controllers.

        If stored data has not been enabled then this call has no effect.

      • stopStored

        public boolean stopStored()
        Stops stored data retrieval for all type controllers in the collection.
